title: Lightfoot Halfling
content:
In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Points for Races that were present in Early Access are removed. And instead, Ability Score Points in the full game correspond with the Class players will choose.

Lightfoot halflings are stealthy but social, traveling all over Faerun to make names for themselves.

Lightfoot Halfling Traits:

Naturally Stealthy: Your nimble nature makes you skilled at concealment. You have advantage on Stealth checks.
